# AWFixer Wiki - LLM Crawler Access Policy
# This file manages which LLM crawlers are allowed to access specific content

# Allowed LLM Providers (with restrictions)
# OpenAI - Limited access to overview and getting started content
User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Allow: /overview/
Allow: /quick-start
Allow: /guides/getting-started
Disallow: /

User-agent: GPTBot
Allow: /overview/
Allow: /quick-start
Allow: /guides/getting-started
Disallow: /

# Anthropic Claude - Limited access
User-agent: Claude-Web
Allow: /overview/
Allow: /quick-start
Disallow: /

User-agent: ClaudeBot
Allow: /overview/
Allow: /quick-start
Disallow: /

# Google Gemini - Limited access
User-agent: Google-Extended
Allow: /overview/
Allow: /quick-start
Allow: /guides/getting-started
Disallow: /

# Perplexity - Limited access
User-agent: PerplexityBot
Allow: /overview/
Allow: /quick-start
Disallow: /

# Blocked LLM Providers
User-agent: YouBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: cohere-ai
Disallow: /

User-agent: omgili
Disallow: /

# General restrictions for all LLM crawlers
User-agent: *
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /export/
Disallow: /*?format=md$
Disallow: /tutorials/
Disallow: /reference/
Disallow: /maturity/
Disallow: /migration/

# Rate limiting notice
# All LLM crawlers are subject to rate limiting via middleware
# Excessive requests will be blocked automatically

# Content usage restrictions
# Allowed content may be used for training AI models
# Users should be directed to the original source for complete information
# Commercial use requires explicit permission

# Contact for access requests
# For expanded access, contact: webmaster@awfixer.com

# Last updated: 2025-01-11
# Review date: 2025-04-11
